title: Handle Damaged Luggage Claim
description: A passenger's suitcase arrived on the baggage carousel with a broken wheel. They want to file a claim.

tasks.description: Retrieve the passenger's booking and baggage information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the passenger and bag details.

tasks.description: Inspect the damage and create a new damaged baggage report, documenting the issue with photos.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a detailed report of the damage.

tasks.description: Explain the claims process to the passenger, including options for repair or replacement, and provide a file reference number.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the next steps and provides a reference number.
